{{Actor| | type = Light source | name = Skulls with candles | class = HeadCandles | game = Doom | doomednum = 29 }}[[Classes]]: <u>HeadCandles</u>
3 skulls on short sticks shoved to an organized pile of more skulls. There's a candle on every base skull.
==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR <u>HeadCandles</u> { {{Property|Radius}} 16 {{Property|Height}} 42 {{Property|ProjectilePassHeight}} -16 +{{Flag|SOLID}} States { Spawn: POL3 AB 6 Bright Loop } }
[[Category:Gore]]
